snippet: Missteps and mistakes — by offense and officials, even by coaches — could not undo the best effort the Steelers’ defense has had this season.
abstract: Judy Battista On Pro Football column observes that Pittsburgh Steelers strong defense was key in 24-20 win over New York Giants.
lead_paragraph: Missteps and mistakes — by offense and officials, even by coaches — could not undo the best effort the Steelers’ defense has had this season.

headline.seo: Defense Lifts Steelers in Road Win Against Giants
headline.main: Steelers’ Defense Keeps Anything From Spoiling Time on Road
headline.print_headline: Steelers’ Defense Keeps Anything From Spoiling Time on Road
